metadata.description: Amber Blake was only a child when she was recruited to the Cleverland Institute, a school for gifted children. But predators hide in the school's administration, abusing the children they're meant to protect, and, on the verge of exposing them, Amber finds herself fleeing for her life from the very man who recruited her. But she's not dead yet—and she's not the only one who wants to see Cleverland's leaders burn.
metadata.name: Amber Blake
